summary: Add a powerful shield to your game. Hunt it down and discover the fate of its owner.
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nx9zE.png[/IMG][/center]

[size=\"3\"][color=\"#8B0000\"]Description[/color][/size]
===========
This mod will add a new light armor to the game. Hunt it down and find out why it was brought to the place it now rests, and what became of the previous owner!

Hint:
[spoiler]
[/spoiler]
[spoiler]
[/spoiler]
[spoiler]
The previous owner has fled from Mzulft towards the south, trying to find refuge among others of her kind.
She made it to the gates of the dark stairs that lead up, towards the entrance where everything goes south, just like it did for her.
[/spoiler]

Summary:
- Adds a powerful light shield
- With this shield, the line between offence en defence fades.: Hurt \'em by bashing, hurt \'em by blocking..
- Short backstory added to near the end.
- Custom model, textures and effects.

[size=\"3\"][color=\"#8B0000\"]Known Issues or Bugs[/color][/size]
====================
None so far
 [spoiler]
Reserved for bugs that can spoil the hunt
[/spoiler]

[size=\"3\"][color=\"#8B0000\"]History[/color][/size]
=======
v1 - initial release
v2 - Cleaned up the ESP - messy records
v2 - Added optional smaller mesh. Requested by Shadowjin 

[size=\"3\"][color=\"#8B0000\"]Contact[/color][/size]
=======
Right here on the Nexus.

[size=\"3\"][color=\"#8B0000\"]Credits[/color][/size]
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim and the CK.
Thanks to The Nexus.com for the great service they provide.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.

[size=\"3\"][color=\"#8B0000\"]Tools Used[/color][/size]
==========

Blender - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=12248
GIMP - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=14920

Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp
Creation Kit by Bethesda

[size=\"3\"][color=\"#8B0000\"]Licensing/Legal[/color][/size]
===============
The contents of this mod cannot be used under any circumstance. Uploading the original file on other sites is allow, when a link to this page is provided and the uploader has the author\'s permission to do so.
Credit should also be given to the original author.

[size=\"3\"][color=\"#8B0000\"]Related[/color][/size]
===============

Look no further! Check out my
